data.title: Country Guest House and Cottage Rental
data.meta_description: Clonalis House is a country guest house & hotel, with cottage rental in Ireland. All are welcome from the United States & United Kingdom. Quality Accommodation.
data.meta_site_name: Clonalis House - Luxury Country House Accommodation
data.text:
‘A home away from home’ declare many of the guest book comments, reflecting the warmth and hospitality at the heart of this elegant family home. Lovingly restored and set amid idyllic countryside, Clonalis invites you into its timeless comfort and encourages you to explore its beautiful rolling parkland and woodland walks that breathe history at every turn.

TOURS

Learn the secrets and stories of one of Ireland’s oldest families and their fascinating lives brought to life by the wonderfully preserved heirlooms and documents dotted throughout the house and the friendly knowledgeable guides.

Then take a wander outside and savour the glorious grounds. There are stunning woodland walks, rivers, rolling lawns and wildflower forests in which to get lost.

BOOK NOW

FOOD AND DRINK

Working with fresh local produce, both from the estate and surrounding area, our food is driven by provenance, celebrating freshness, simplicity and vibrancy. Food is served in the historic dining room amidst flickering candlelight and dished in good company.

What better way to enhance your stay or vacation…
